history: TTS !b <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break strength='strong' /> an assistant that gives you transportation directions. <break strength='strong' /> Your conversation will be recorded for research purposes to help improve our system. <break strength='strong' /> Your enkkkrrypted phone number will be stored in a secure manner and will not be shared with anyone. <break strength='strong' /> This is so we can keep your preferences for future calls. <break strength='strong' /> Your participation is voluntaaaaary. <break strength='strong' /> By continuing to use this system you confirm that you are at least 18 and that you agree that we may use the data we record for research. <break strength='strong' /> We may share the data with researchers, however no personal information will be shared. <break strength='x-strong' /> At any point in the conversation, you may ask me to repeat something or to pause. <break time='1s'/> </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER I want to take the bus.
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where are you going?
USER I'd like to go to Carnegie Mellon University.
TTS Okay, going to carnegie mellon university. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where would you like to leave from?
USER the airport
TTS Okay, going to pittsburgh international airport. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where are you leaving from?
USER No, I'm leaving from the airport.
TTS Okay, leaving from pittsburgh international airport. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you want to travel
USER I'm going to Carnegie Mellon University.
TTS Okay, going to carnegie mellon university. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you wanna travel?
USER I'm traveling at 7 p.m.
TTS Okay, travelling at 07:00 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER No, I want to travel at 8 p.m.
TTS Okay, travelling at 08:00 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER No, I'm leaving right now.
TTS <speak> Sounds good. <break strength='strong' /> Let me know if you didn't understand a step, and I'll repeat it for you. </speak>

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 1 hour 8 minutes, and you will take 1 bus.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 13 mins to Pittsburgh International airport lower level. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Are you ready for the next step? </speak>
